synopsis.text: Kagami Ouri, an orphan raised in a shrine with other children, finds himself inexplicably drawn into a world of the living dead, known as Shikabane. After witnessing his adoptive brother, Keisei Tagami, revive the scarred corpse of a schoolgirl named Makina Hoshimura, Ouri's life takes a dramatic turn. Makina, now a Shikabane Hime, is an undead being tasked with eliminating other Shikabane who pose a threat to society. As Ouri's encounters with Makina intensify, he becomes entangled in a supernatural web, uncovering the dark secrets behind the world of Shikabanes and the mysterious organization responsible for his family's brutal murder. With Makina seeking vengeance and Ouri discovering his brother's hidden life, the two must navigate this twisted world together, hunting down the undead and uncovering the truth behind their intertwined fates.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
